channel.title: davincio NoteBook
channel.description: Studying the Art of Science & the Science of Art

item.title: Robot Ric: From Blog Post to Best-Selling Novel
item.description: What began as a simple blog post has blossomed into a captivating novel that explores the journey of a waterproof robot as it navigates the challenges of a mighty river and seeks to understand the essence of humanity. Discover how this story has captured hearts worldwide and sparked discussions on the nature of consciousness and existence.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom ()
